Name: Meteor Shower
About the game: This game is meteor shower. Game aim is escape the meteors. Try yourself how many meteor you escape. This game have online score system. In game write username and press space to start game. In game if you lose press r to retry. In game if you want show menu press m. In game if you want go right press d. In game if you want go left press a.
Meta Title: Meteor Shower: Jun 12, 2018, Rifat Erdoğan and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Meteor Shower? Check out the release date (Jun 12, 2018), developer insights from Rifat Erdoğan, and a complete game summary.
